entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries or rain showers ending this evening then partly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 this evening then light before morning. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 27 December 2022
